price: Ela disse: "Por certo, refugio-me nO Misericordioso, contra ti. Se és piedoso, não te aproximes."
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
